languages.text: Прошедшая тернистый путь бок о бок с Вольным Торговцем, Ирлиэт завершила его на алтаре в качестве подношения Той, Что Жаждет. Чудовищное предательство Лорд-капитана ранило ее душу, но муки длились недолго — Темное божество быстро поглотило ее.

Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.
languages.original_text: Прошедшая тернистый путь бок о бок с Вольным Торговцем, Ирлиэт завершила его на алтаре в качестве подношения Той, Что Жаждет. Чудовищное предательство Лорд-капитана ранило ее душу, но муки длились недолго — Темное божество быстро поглотило ее.

traits.locale_text: Having threaded a thorny path by Rogue Trader's side, at the end of it, Yrliet found herself on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. An atrocious betrayal wounded her soul, but her suffering did not persist — the dark deity soon consumed her.

Having threaded a thorny path by Rogue Trader's side, at the end of it, Yrliet found herself on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. An atrocious betrayal wounded her soul, but her suffering did not persist — the dark deity soon consumed her.

Having followed a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was mutilated by atrocious betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

Having followed a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was mutilated by atrocious betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特陪伴着行商浪人踏上了荆棘之路，在此之后却被当成了祭品，献祭给了饥渴女士。行商浪人残酷的背叛摧残了她的灵魂，但她的痛苦并没有持续太久，因为黑暗之神很快就吞噬了她。
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特陪伴着行商浪人踏上了荆棘之路，在此之后却被当成了祭品，献祭给了饥渴女士。残酷的背叛狠狠地摧残了她的灵魂，但她的痛苦并没有持续太久，因为黑暗之神很快就吞噬了她。

languages.text: Nachdem sie an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einen dornigen Pfad beschritten hatte, fand Yrliet ihr Ende als Opfer auf einem Altar zu Ehren von Ihr, die dürstet. Ihre Seele war durch den grausamen Verrat des Lord Captains schwer verwundet worden, doch das Leid dauerte nicht lange. Die dunkle Gottheit verschlang sie bald.
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einen dornigen Pfad beschritten hatte, fand Yrliet ihr Ende als Opfer auf einem Altar zu Ehren von Ihr, die dürstet. Ihre Seele wurde durch einen grausamen Verrat verstümmelt, doch das Leid dauerte nicht lange. Die dunkle Gottheit verschlang sie bald.

languages.text: Après avoir arpenté une voie accidentée aux côtés de {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Yrliet rendit son dernier souffle sur un autel sacrificiel dédié à l'Assoiffée. Son âme avait été mutilée par la monstrueuse trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais ses souffrances furent brèves, car la ténébreuse déesse l'engloutit rapidement.
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir arpenté une voie accidentée aux côtés de {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Yrliet rendit son dernier souffle sur un autel sacrificiel dédié à l'Assoiffée. Son âme avait été mutilée par une atroce trahison, mais ses souffrances furent brèves, car la ténébreuse déesse l'engloutit rapidement.

languages.text: El camino espinoso que recorrió junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente solo llevó a Yrliet a acabar sacrificada en un altar como ofrenda a la Sedienta. Su alma quedó herida por la atroz traición de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, pero su sufrimiento no duró mucho, pues la deidad oscura no tardó en consumirla.
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: El camino espinoso que recorrió junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente solo llevó a Yrliet a acabar sacrificada en un altar como ofrenda a la Sedienta. Su alma quedó mutilada por la atroz traición, pero su sufrimiento no duró mucho, pues la deidad oscura no tardó en consumirla.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の傍らで険しい道に付き従ってきたユリエットは、かの渇きたる女への供物となり、祭壇で最期の時を迎えた。彼女の魂はロード・キャプテンの非道な裏切りによってずたずたに切り裂かれていたが、苦しみは長く続かなかった。暗黒の神がすぐに彼女を飲み込んだのだ。
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の傍らで険しい道に付き従ってきたユリエットは、かの渇きたる女への供物となり、祭壇で最期の時を迎えた。彼女の魂はロード・キャプテンの非道な裏切りによってずたずたに切り裂かれていたが、苦しみは長く続かなかった。暗黒の神がすぐに彼女を飲み込んだのだ。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in yanında dikenli bir yolda yürüyen Yrliet, bir sunakta Susayan'a kurban edilerek son nefesini verdi. Ruhu, Lord Kaptan'ın korkunç ihanetiyle yaralıydı. Neyse ki uzun süre acı çekmek zorunda kalmadı, karanlık ilah onu kısa sürede tüketti.
languages.original_text: Having walked a thorny path by the Rogue Trader's side, Yrliet met her end on an altar as an offering to She Who Thirsts. Her soul was wounded by the Lord Captain's monstrous betrayal, but the suffering did not last long — the dark deity soon consumed her.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in yanında dikenli bir yolda yürüyen Yrliet'in sonu bir sunakta, Susayan'a kurban edilerek geldi. Ruhu, Lord Kaptan'ın korkunç ihanetiyle yaralanmıştı ancak uzun süre acı çekmek zorunda kalmadı, karanlık ilah onu kısa süre içinde tüketti.
